changelog_text:
**What's New in v1.7.8:**

**Added:**
• Disable emoji suggestions while typing
• Quick reply in another chat by holding 'Reply' button in bottom bar
• Allow reply button to show where user don't have canPost permission - On click reply in another chat
• Option to remove greeting sticker
• Long click actions for some switches
• Option to customize message swipe action
• Option to repeat the message in current chat
• Remove HTTPS when copying internal links
• Missing parameter for code & mention hook in the new app version

**Changed:**
• Adapted plugin to Telegram's redesigned bottom bar with long-press action selector for NoQuote
• Changed schedule message icon to msg_calendar2
• Refactored Unread Badge on back button
• Refactored all input dialogues of plugin
• Small tweaks in settings page
• Adjusted padding for filter pills

**Fixed:**
• Tips and tricks showing android open with sheet instead of opening in the current app
• Issue where sending a message with NoQuote to topics would always send it to the general thread
• GIFs with spoiler and caption always being sent to the general thread
• GIFs with spoiler and caption not replying to the quoted message and instead being left as a draft
• Pills clipping on Plugins screen
• Mutual Contact cell width with MD3 containers
• Issue where schedule button is clickable while typing
• Issue where 'NoQuote forward' is showing in scheduled messages
• Issue where schedule button is showing in isInScheduleMode()
• Folder pills overlapping search view
